name: Job Application Tracker
description: Job Tracker built using React JS and Express that allows the user to have full CRUD accessibility.

name: Bookmark'd
description: Application that allows user to track, create, update, and delete all bookmarks they create with full. Frontend is built using React, Backend is Express JS.

name: The Zoo
description: Fully functional workout application that allows the user to track and create all personal workouts. Using React JS and Express for the build along with SASS for styling.

name: My NFL
description: Full CRUD application using React JS and Django that allows the user to track all teams that also includes a favorites function
